data.title: San Antonio Spurs
data.meta_description: San Antonio Spurs suite pricing will vary by opponent, day of the week, and suite size/location. On average, private suites for Spurs games will be priced between $3,900 - $7,500.

Our 100% Guarantee

No matter what happens, Suite Experience Group has you covered - your suite will be protected by our 100% Guarantee.

The SEG 100% Guarantee

We guarantee you will receive your suite tickets in time for your event. In the extremely rare case that you do not, we will offer you an alternative option if available or we will refund you at least 100% of your total purchase price.

If the event is canceled or if fans are no longer permitted, you may choose to receive a full refund or a credit towards a future SEG purchase.

If the event date changes, you will receive the suite you purchased for the new date.

Please reach out to us if you have any further questions at [email protected] or 800-592-7043.

San Antonio Spurs Suite Prices and Details

How much do San Antonio Spurs suites cost?

San Antonio Spurs suite prices range from $3,000-$9,000 depending on the opponent, as well as suite size and location at the Frost Bank Center (Formerly AT&T Center). Included in the price of a Spurs suite rental will be tickets, parking passes and, in most cases, a food and beverage credit.

How many guests can fit in a Spurs suite?

Private luxury suites for San Antonio Spurs games come with 16 tickets included, with an option to purchase up to 8 additional suite tickets, for a max suite capacity of 24 guests. Spurs luxury boxes have the interior space to accommodate all guests in a comfortable and luxurious environment.

Suite Levels at Frost Bank Center

Terrace Suite

16-18 Tickets

4-5 Parking

Catering Available

×

Terrace Suite Details

Terrace Suites are located on the main suite level at the Frost Bank Center. Terrace Suites come fully private to your group. Most Terrace Suites will accommodate between 16 and 24 guests. Suites feature cushioned stadium-style seating on an open air balcony overlooking the court in addition to an assortment of lounge seats and barstools configured around the suite. All suites are furnished with a bar/kitchenette, multiple HDTV's, and in-suite WiFi.

To book a Terrace Suite

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Courtside Box

2-12 Tickets

1-4 Parking

Food & Beverage Included

×

Courtside Box Details

A Courtside Box can accommodate 2-12 guests and will put them closest to the action. Located on the Charter Level, Courtside Box guests have access to the Charter Suite Club. Three Course Chef's Table dinner including beer and wine is included for Spurs games. Heavy appetizers and non-alcoholic drinks are included for concerts and other family events. VIP parking passes and private entry into the Frost Bank Center are also included.

To book a Courtside Box

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Ledge Box

4 Tickets

2 Parking

Food & Beverage Included

×

Ledge Box Details

Ledge Boxes feature high top seats situated in table-style sections on a ledge overlooking the court. The Ledge Boxes are located on the Terrace Level. Three Course Chef's Table dinner with beer and house wine is included for Spurs games at the Frost Bank Center. A Ledge Box will include 4-6 tickets and 2 VIP parking passes.

To book a Ledge Box

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Theater Box

4 Tickets

2 Parking

Food & Beverage Included

×

Theater Box Details

Theater Boxes are opera-style, semi-private seating boxes for small groups. They'll accommodate 4-6 guests. Theater Boxes are connected to a shared club area featuring all-inclusive dining and a full-service bar. Catering includes Three Course Chef's Table dinner for Spurs games and rodeo events. Beer and house wine are included for Spurs games. Each Theater Box comes with a reserved private dining table in the club.

To book a Theater Box

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Frost Bank Center Event Planning Guide

Catering

Spurs suites can be catered at an additional cost. Most Spurs suites will include a catering credit with your suite rental. The Spurs suite menu includes a wide range of food and beverage options provided by Levy Restaurants. On average, most people spend around $80 per person on food and drinks.

×

Catering Details

Following a suite purchase, you will be provided with the suite menu and necessary order forms to complete your order. A pre-order deadline is typically one week prior to the date of your event. You won't be charged for what you ordered until day of the event. If needed, you can also order food and drinks from the suite through your suite attendant.

Parking and Transportation

San Antonio Spurs luxury boxes include VIP parking passes for easier entry to and from Spurs games. All seven AT&T Center parking lots open 3 hours in advance of Spurs games. Spurs suite ticket holders can enter the Frost Bank Center (formerly AT&T Center) 2 hours before tip-off for a Spurs game.

Budget

San Antonio suites accommodate a wide range of budgets, depending on the type of suite purchased. On average, Spurs suites cost between $3,500-$8,500. Payment is due in full at time of purchase. In-suite catering won't be charged until game day and typically costs around $80 per person.

Club Access

Spurs luxury suite ticket holders received access to 2 VIP clubs at the Frost Bank Center: The Frost & Dahill Saddles & Spurs Club on the Club Level and the SWBC Terrace Club Restaurant located on the Terrace Level. When you rent a San Antonio Spurs suite you will have access to both premium club... MORE

Spurs luxury suite ticket holders received access to 2 VIP clubs at the Frost Bank Center: The Frost & Dahill Saddles & Spurs Club on the Club Level and the SWBC Terrace Club Restaurant located on the Terrace Level. When you rent a San Antonio Spurs suite you will have access to both premium club areas.

Dress Code

San Antonio Spurs suites do not require a particular dress code. For corporate events, many guests will be dressed in business casual attire, though guests often wear Spurs-branded apparel. The Spurs luxury suites at the Frost Bank Center are climate controlled and have a coat closet for storage.

Business Amenities

There is limited space for meetings and conferences on game day. Some guests choose to give a short presentation in their suite before the game. You can connect a laptop to the TVs in the suite via HDMI cable. Please inquire with your SEG representative if you wish to reserve a conference room.

Venue Bag Policy

Spurs suite guests at the Frost Bank Center (formerly AT&T Center) must adhere to the arena bag policy. Bags will be screened by Security upon entrance to the AT&T Center at all events. Bags are restricted to the standard 12”x12”x6”. Guests without bags are encouraged to use the "EXPRESS: No... MORE

Spurs suite guests at the Frost Bank Center (formerly AT&T Center) must adhere to the arena bag policy. Bags will be screened by Security upon entrance to the AT&T Center at all events. Bags are restricted to the standard 12”x12”x6”. Guests without bags are encouraged to use the "EXPRESS: No Bags" lanes to expedite entrance.

Entrances

San Antonio Spurs suite ticket holders can take advantage of VIP entrances to AT&T Center. Simply show your suite ticket at the SW, SE, or NE VIP entrance for expedited entrance into Frost Bank Center (formerly AT&T center). Suite parking passes typically align with the preferred entrance to allow... MORE

San Antonio Spurs suite ticket holders can take advantage of VIP entrances to AT&T Center. Simply show your suite ticket at the SW, SE, or NE VIP entrance for expedited entrance into Frost Bank Center (formerly AT&T center). Suite parking passes typically align with the preferred entrance to allow easy access to your suite.

Child Ticket Policy

San Antonio Spurs suite ticket holders must adhere to the Frost Bank Center's child ticket policy. Children under the age of 2 will not require a ticket to enter the arena. All children older will need a ticket. Strollers are permitted at Frost Bank Center and can be stored in the luxury suite.

Frequently Asked San Antonio Spurs Questions

Will my San Antonio Spurs luxury suite be completely private?

Yes, all San Antonio Spurs luxury suite rentals will be completely private unless explicitly communicated otherwise.

How will I receive my Spurs luxury box tickets?

All Spurs luxury box tickets are digital and will be transferred to you via email.

When can I expect to receive my skybox tickets?

Your skybox tickets will be transferred to you 1 to 2 weeks prior to your game.

Please view our Frequently Asked Questions or Contact Us.

We are always happy to assist you.

Spurs Spotlight

Current NBA Season

Victor Wembanyama has taken the NBA by storm before stepping on the court. The buzz surrounding the newest San Antonio Spur should continue in 2023-24. Wembanyama is one of the highest regarded prospects of the 21st century, and for good measure. In France last year, the big man averaged over 21 points and 10 rebounds. He tallied three blocks a game. And Wembanyama continues to develop as an outside shooter. Standing at 7’2”, the Frenchman has no flaws. He’s expected to vault to stardom immediately. That alone is worth the price of admission. Wembanyama joins Keldon Johnson and Devin Vassell in San Antonio. Under storied head coach Gregg Popovich, you won’t want to miss the Spurs this season.

Frost Bank Center provides elite luxury opportunities. The Courtside Club has the best seats in the house. Access to the Club is through a private dedicated walkway. All-inclusive... MORE

Victor Wembanyama has taken the NBA by storm before stepping on the court. The buzz surrounding the newest San Antonio Spur should continue in 2023-24. Wembanyama is one of the highest regarded prospects of the 21st century, and for good measure. In France last year, the big man averaged over 21 points and 10 rebounds. He tallied three blocks a game. And Wembanyama continues to develop as an outside shooter. Standing at 7’2”, the Frenchman has no flaws. He’s expected to vault to stardom immediately. That alone is worth the price of admission. Wembanyama joins Keldon Johnson and Devin Vassell in San Antonio. Under storied head coach Gregg Popovich, you won’t want to miss the Spurs this season.

Frost Bank Center provides elite luxury opportunities. The Courtside Club has the best seats in the house. Access to the Club is through a private dedicated walkway. All-inclusive food and drink, embroidered seat backs, in-seat service, VIP parking, exclusive invitations, and more are included. San Antonio has Courtside, Theater, and Ledge Boxes for fans as well. Ledge Boxes have all-inclusive amenities with premium amenities. Theater Boxes include similar accommodations with a private dining area and bar. Courtside Boxes are the only opportunity to host up to 12 guests in the lower level and have access to private Clubs. Suites are available too. Terrace Suites have a flexible environment with parking passes, restaurant and Club access, and VIP experiences.

Past Spotlights

For the first time in his Hall of Fame career, head coach Gregg Popovich will be at the helm of a youth movement for the Spurs. A total of four first-round draft picks were compiled in trades involving Derrick White and Dejounte Murray, and they had three first-round picks in the 2022 draft. They used them on Jeremy Sochan, Malaki Brandham, and Blake Wesley. Keldon Johnson had a great fourth year and will be around for another four years after he was given a contract extension. Tre Jones, Devin Vassell, and veteran Doug McDermott will also participate in the development of a young San Antonio team this year.

The AT&T Center remains one of the best venues for basketball due to its design where the seats feel like they’re right on top of the action. Get up close in luxury with Courtside Boxes, which come in quantities from 2-12 and include parking passes, all-inclusive food and beverage, and a private restroom. Ledge and Theater Boxes hold four people each, are at the ends of the arena, and include the same perks as the Courtside Box. Terrace Suites are toward the top of the arena and hold 16-18 fans. These are fully private and come with catering options to suit your group’s needs.

The resident dean of the NBA needs only 26 more victories to become the league’s all-time winningest head coach. Gregg Popovich should eclipse that number, but how many more he adds to his career total will all depend on how quickly this young roster blossoms. With the Big-3 days long in the rearview mirror, Popovich will look toward grooming Keldon Johnson as San Antonio’s next star. The 22-year-old added a gold medal over the summer after being named as a replacement for Team USA in the Olympic Games. Dejounte Murray took his game up a level last year, as the versatile guard notched four triple-doubles. The Spurs invested heavily in veterans during the offseason, bringing in Thaddeus Young, Doug McDermott, Al-Farouq Aminu, Bryn Forbes, and Zach Collins to compete for minutes. Courtside Seating at the AT&T Center is as good as it gets for your Premium experience. Start by entering through your own private walkway to the Courtside Club for a delectable three course chef’s table dinner before watching the Spurs take the floor through a unique glass tunnel vantage point. Skip the lines with early entry through your purchase of a Super Box. A dedicated account representative will ensure your food and beverage needs, not to mention exclusive access to the Frost and Dahill Saddles & Spurs Clubs.

How Do I Book This Suite?

INSTANT BOOK suites can be purchased online by clicking the INSTANT BOOK button.

Other suites can be purchased by clicking on the button and submitting your request. Our experienced sales staff is standing by and will respond right away.

Call us any time at 800-592-7043 to discuss options or ask any questions.

Catering, Transportation, and Lodging can be handled after your purchase by our world class support team.

×

Luxury Suite Costs

What determines how much a suite costs?

Suite pricing varies widely based on a number of variables including league, city, team, opponent, time of day, day of week, and suite location.

Day of Week: In general, suites can be slightly more expensive during weekdays (Monday through Thursday) because those days are ideal for corporations to entertain their clients in a suite.

League: NFL suites are the most expensive by because of the limited number of games (8 home games per team).

Suite Location: While just being in a suite is generally seen as the most desirable and luxurious seat in the building, some stadiums and arenas have multiple suite levels. If this is the case, certain clients are willing to pay a premium to be in a lower level suite that is closest to the action on the field. We will give you details on suite location as we provide you with availability for the game you desire.

Does it pay to wait to book a suite until closer to the event?

With regular tickets, prices will often drop in the days leading up to a game. While every once in a while the same occurs with suites, in general, pricing does not drop before the game. In fact, because of the very limited availability of luxury suites, it is advised to book a suite well in advance, as suites are often not available at the last minute. In addition, in coordinating events for larger groups (suites can hold up to 20 guests or more), it is often necessary to give guests a longer lead time to confirm their availability to attend.

Are there additional expenses I should consider?

If you are hosting guests in your suite, consider allocating enough budget to order catering for your suite. Catering is typically not included in the price of the suite. Suite Experience Group clients typically spend between $1,000-$2,000 for catering, with some clients spending even more if they order significant amounts of alcohol.

Are there discounts if I buy multiple games at once?

Some clients purchase multiple suites in multiple venues at one time. Suite Experience Group can provide special package pricing for clients who buy three or more suites at one time.

How can I maximize my budget?

If you are working within a budget and trying to maximize your spend, we would welcome an opportunity to further discuss your goals for the event and the different options available to you. Please call us at 800-592-7043 or fill out this form to get started. We look forward to the opportunity to help you explore your options in renting a luxury suite.
